Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo was not taken under an electron microscope, as confirmed by the photographer himself.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or factual basis to support the claim that the photo shows the face of an ant through an electron microscope.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo was taken under an electron microscope, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the photo was taken using a mirrorless camera and additional lenses, as explained by the photographer.
